    • Constructor Detail

      • Circle

        public Circle()
        Creates a circle located at (0,0) with a radius of 0

      • Circle

        public Circle(int x,
              int y,
              double radius)
        Creates a circle located at (x,y) with a radius of "radius"
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the center of the circle
        y - the y coordinate of the center of the circle
        radius - the radius of the circle

    • Method Detail

      • getCircumference

        public double getCircumference()
        Returns the circumference of the circle
        Returns:
        a double with the value of the circumference of the circle

      • getArea

        public double getArea()
        Returns the area of the circle
        Returns:
        a double with the value of the area of the circle

      • isPointInside

        public boolean isPointInside(int x1,
                             int y1)
        Checks if a point (x,y) is located inside the circle, not including the edge of the circle
        Parameters:
        x1 - the x coordinate of the point
        y1 - the y coordinanate of the point
        Returns:
        a boolean which is true if the point is inside the circle

      • moveEdgeTo

        public void moveEdgeTo(int x1,
                       int y1)
        Scales the circle such that the edge of the circle is touching the point (x,y)
        Parameters:
        x1 - the x coordinate of the point
        y1 - the y coordinate of the point

      • drawnInRange

        public boolean drawnInRange(int lowerx,
                            int lowery,
                            int upperx,
                            int uppery)
        Checks if the circle is drawn completely inside a rectangular space
        Parameters:
        lowerx - the smallest x value possible in the rectangle
        lowery - the smallest y value possible in the rectangle
        upperx - the largest x value possible in the rectangle
        uppery - the largest y value possible in the rectangle
        Returns:
        a boolean which is true if the circle can be drawn in the rectangle without any parts of the circle falling outside of the rectangle

      • draw

        public void draw()
        Draws the line segment onto the PApplet
        Specified by:
        draw in class Shape
        Precondition
        All styles must be set before the draw() method is called. SetSurface must be called to assign a PApplet to which the Shape is to be drawn.
        Postcondition
        The PApplet associated with the rectangle object now contains a rectangle. The x, y, width, and height are cast to floats, so the precision will be reduced.
